meanings.definition: A record of events year by year.
meanings.sent1: The annal of the town listed all the important happenings annually.
meanings.sent2: The annal of the family was meticulously maintained in a journal.
meanings.sent3: Reading the annal of the school's events made everyone chuckle at the old traditions.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like an annal, preserving every detail of the past.
meanings.sent5: The annal of the explorer's journey painted a vivid picture of his adventures.

meanings.sent1: The annal of the ancient civilization provided insights into their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: Historians referred to the annal to understand the sequence of events.
meanings.sent3: The annal of the kingdom was so detailed that it felt like reading a thrilling novel.
meanings.sent4: The annal of wars and conquests unfolded like a dramatic saga.
meanings.sent5: The annal of discoveries shed light on the progress of science through the ages.

meanings.sent1: Grandma's annal of her youth was filled with fascinating stories.
meanings.sent2: The annal of the expedition was published for all to read.
meanings.sent3: The annal of the detective's cases read like a mystery novel.
meanings.sent4: The annal of the artist's life was a tale of passion and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The annal of the village was passed down through generations, preserving its history.
